ing: freshly ground black pepper to taste
des: "Canned lentil soup as sauce for pasta -- simple and tasty."
ins: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  Add spaghetti and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain, but do not rinse, and return to pot.  Stir in lentil soup and season with black pepper.  Heat through and serve.
